reviewText: Love it; you will laugh, & cry. A good Book read that will help especially if you have a loved one with Dementia.

Okay story.  But the acting was the worst that I have ever seen to the point it was extremely distracting.  The actor were completely disconnected form their characters and they were basically just saying the lines.  I also think there was too much to this story and would have been much better as a 10 minute short.
